gw.plugin.management

Class ManagementPlugin

  • gw.plugin.management.ManagementPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin

    public class ManagementPlugin
implements com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    The ManagementPlugin interface serves as the external management interface for Guidewire systems. As the application starts up and runs, GWMBeans will be registered and unregistered. It's the job of the plugin to expose these beans the external world however it sees fit (via JMX, via SNMP, etc.).
